title: “His third eye…”: Candace Owens claims Charlie Kirk believed he was psychic and a time traveller
summary_full: Candace Owens claims Charlie Kirk spoke privately about having psychic abilities, including a “third eye,” astral projection, and unusual childhood experiences. She also alleged he believed he might die young and referenced a CIA program called “Project Looking Glass.” The unverified remarks have sparked backlash, with critics questioning her claims and their impact on Kirk’s legacy.
